name: MakeMeWifeReady
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: make me wife ready
des:
Are you ready for a 28 Day Challenge that will make you into a wife?

Today most young women have not been raised to be a wife.

And have been told that the most important thing they will do in their life is their career.

And that’s simply not true, and it's not true for most women.

Because after age 45, if you don’t have a family, you realize the intense career was actually a distraction.

You realize Career, Bad boys, Travel, the Hot-girl-Summer…. 

Are all distractions and the looming mountain you should have focused on was getting picked as a wife, your Wedding day and starting a family.

You realize modern culture has pushed you in the opposite direction. 

Because after the age of 45 that loneliness starts to overwhelm.

The missing family you could have had.

And the role of wife and mother you could have been seems further away.

You are further away from the wedding and the family. 

It's okay to scream now and if you like, maybe even cry.

Now stop screaming and stop crying.

I help women find their Feminine attraction in this over-masculinized world and help them get picked as a wife.

This is the Alexa, Make Me Wife Ready 28 Day Challenge.

And if you are still listening to this now, it's a sign that you need to Start your Day 1.

Enable ‘Alexa, Make Me Wife Ready’ now and start the challenge today.
